goals.description: Advanced Binary Format Support and Serialization
goals.success_criteria: Implement efficient binary serialization/deserialization for TuskLang configurations with compression, encryption, and versioning support

goals.description: Real-time Configuration Synchronization and Hot Reloading
goals.success_criteria: Build a real-time configuration synchronization system with WebSocket support, file watching, and automatic hot reloading across multiple instances

goals.description: Advanced CLI Framework with Interactive Mode and Auto-completion
goals.success_criteria: Create an interactive CLI framework with command auto-completion, help system, and advanced command chaining for TuskLang operations
